00025 // main system configuration
00026 require '../../../sysconfig.inc.php';
00027 // start the session
00028 require SENAYAN_BASE_DIR.'admin/default/session.inc.php';
00029 require SIMBIO_BASE_DIR.'simbio_GUI/table/simbio_table.inc.php';
00030 require SIMBIO_BASE_DIR.'simbio_GUI/form_maker/simbio_form_table_AJAX.inc.php';
00031 require SIMBIO_BASE_DIR.'simbio_GUI/paging/simbio_paging_ajax.inc.php';
00032 require SIMBIO_BASE_DIR.'simbio_DB/datagrid/simbio_dbgrid.inc.php';
00033 
00034 // privileges checking
00035 $can_read = utility::havePrivilege('bibliography', 'r');
00036 
00037 if (!$can_read) {
00038     die('<div class="errorBox">'.__('You are not authorized to view this section').'</div>');
00039 }
00040 
00041 $max_print = 50;
00042 
00043 /* RECORD OPERATION */
00044 if (isset($_POST['itemID']) AND !empty($_POST['itemID']) AND isset($_POST['itemAction'])) {
00045     if (!$can_read) {
00046         die();
00047     }
00048     if (!is_array($_POST['itemID'])) {
00049         // make an array
00050         $_POST['itemID'] = array((integer)$_POST['itemID']);
00051     }
00052     /* LABEL SESSION ADDING PROCESS */
00053     if (isset($_SESSION['labels'])) {
00054         $print_count = count($_SESSION['labels']);
00055     } else {
00056         $print_count = 0;
00057     }
00058     // loop array
00059     foreach ($_POST['itemID'] as $itemID) {
00060         if ($print_count == $max_print) {
00061             $limit_reach = true;
00062             break;
00063         }
00064         $itemID = (integer)$itemID;
00065         if (isset($_SESSION['labels'][$itemID])) {
00066             continue;
00067         }
00068         $_SESSION['labels'][$itemID] = $itemID;
00069         $print_count++;
00070     }
00071     if (isset($limit_reach)) {
00072         $msg = str_replace('{max_print}', $max_print, __('Selected items NOT ADDED to print queue. Only {max_print} can be printed at once')); //mfc
00073         utility::jsAlert($msg);
00074     } else {
00075         // update print queue count object
00076         echo '<script type="text/javascript">parent.$(\'queueCount\').update(\''.$print_count.'\');</script>';
00077         utility::jsAlert(__('Selected items added to print queue'));
00078     }
00079     exit();
00080 }
00081 
00082 // clean print queue
00083 if (isset($_GET['action']) AND $_GET['action'] == 'clear') {
00084     utility::jsAlert(__('Print queue cleared!'));
00085     echo '<script type="text/javascript">parent.$(\'queueCount\').update(\'0\');</script>';
00086     unset($_SESSION['labels']);
00087     exit();
00088 }
00089 
00090 // on print action
00091 if (isset($_GET['action']) AND $_GET['action'] == 'print') {
00092     // check if label session array is available
00093     if (!isset($_SESSION['labels'])) {
00094         utility::jsAlert(__('There is no data to print!'));
00095         die();
00096     }
00097     if (count($_SESSION['labels']) < 1) {
00098         utility::jsAlert(__('There is no data to print!'));
00099         die();
00100     }
00101 
00102     // concat all ID together
00103     $item_ids = '';
00104     foreach ($_SESSION['labels'] as $id) {
00105         $item_ids .= $id.',';
00106     }
00107     // strip the last comma
00108     $item_ids = substr_replace($item_ids, '', -1);
00109     // send query to database
00110     $biblio_q = $dbs->query('SELECT IF(i.call_number!=\'\', i.call_number, b.call_number) FROM biblio AS b LEFT JOIN item AS i ON b.biblio_id=i.biblio_id WHERE i.item_id IN('.$item_ids.')');
00111     $label_data_array = array();
00112     while ($biblio_d = $biblio_q->fetch_row()) {
00113         if ($biblio_d[0]) { $label_data_array[] = $biblio_d[0]; }
00114     }
00115 
00116     // include printed settings configuration file
00117     include SENAYAN_BASE_DIR.'admin'.DIRECTORY_SEPARATOR.'admin_template'.DIRECTORY_SEPARATOR.'printed_settings.inc.php';
00118     // check for custom template settings
00119     $custom_settings = SENAYAN_BASE_DIR.'admin'.DIRECTORY_SEPARATOR.$sysconf['admin_template']['dir'].DIRECTORY_SEPARATOR.$sysconf['template']['theme'].DIRECTORY_SEPARATOR.'printed_settings.inc.php';
00120     if (file_exists($custom_settings)) {
00121         include $custom_settings;
00122     }
00123     // chunk label array
00124     $chunked_label_arrays = array_chunk($label_data_array, $items_per_row);
00125     // create html ouput of images
00126     $html_str = '<!DOCTYPE html PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD XHTML 1.0 Transitional//EN" "http://www.w3.org/TR/xhtml1/DTD/xhtml1-transitional.dtd">'."\n";
00127     $html_str .= '<html xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml"><head><title>Document Label Print Result</title>'."\n";
00128     $html_str .= '<meta http-equiv="Content-Type" content="text/html; charset=utf-8" />'."\n";
00129     $html_str .= '<style type="text/css">'."\n";
00130     $html_str .= 'body { padding: 0; margin: 1cm; font-family: '.$fonts.'; }'."\n";
00131     $html_str .= '.labelStyle { width: '.$box_width.'cm; height: '.$box_height.'cm; text-align: center; margin: '.$items_margin.'cm; padding: 0; border: '.$border_size.'px solid #000000; }'."\n";
00132     $html_str .= '.labelHeaderStyle { background-color: #CCCCCC; font-weight: bold; padding: 5px; margin-bottom: 5px; }'."\n";
00133     $html_str .= '</style>'."\n";
00134     $html_str .= '</head>'."\n";
00135     $html_str .= '<body>'."\n";
00136     $html_str .= '<table style="margin: 0; padding: 0;" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">'."\n";
00137     // loop the chunked arrays to row
00138     foreach ($chunked_label_arrays as $label_data) {
00139         $html_str .= '<tr>'."\n";
00140         foreach ($label_data as $label) {
00141             $html_str .= '<td valign="top">';
00142             $html_str .= '<div class="labelStyle" valign="top">';
00143             if ($include_header_text) { $html_str .= '<div class="labelHeaderStyle">'.($header_text?$header_text:$sysconf['library_name']).'</div>'; }
00144             // explode label data by space
00145             $sliced_label = explode(' ', $label, 5);
00146             foreach ($sliced_label as $slice_label_item) {
00147                 $html_str .= $slice_label_item.'<br />';
00148             }
00149             $html_str .= '</div>';
00150             $html_str .= '</td>';
00151         }
00152         $html_str .= '</tr>'."\n";
00153     }
00154     $html_str .= '</table>'."\n";
00155     $html_str .= '<script type="text/javascript">self.print();</script>'."\n";
00156     $html_str .= '</body></html>'."\n";
00157     // unset the session
00158     unset($_SESSION['labels']);
00159     // write to file
00160     $file_write = @file_put_contents(FILES_UPLOAD_DIR.'label_print_result.html', $html_str);
00161     if ($file_write) {
00162         echo '<script type="text/javascript">parent.$(\'queueCount\').update(\'0\');</script>';
00163         // open result in new window
00164         echo '<script type="text/javascript">parent.openWin(\''.SENAYAN_WEB_ROOT_DIR.FILES_DIR.'/label_print_result.html\', \'popLabelGen\', 800, 500, true)</script>';
00165     } else { utility::jsAlert('ERROR! Label failed to generate, possibly because '.SENAYAN_BASE_DIR.FILES_DIR.' directory is not writable'); }
00166     exit();
00167 }

00172 <div class="menuBoxInner printIcon">
00173     <?php echo __('Labels Printing'); ?> - <a target="blindSubmit" href="<?php echo MODULES_WEB_ROOT_DIR; ?>bibliography/dl_print.php?action=print" class="headerText2"><?php echo __('Print Labels for Selected Data'); ?></a>
00174     &nbsp; <a target="blindSubmit" href="<?php echo MODULES_WEB_ROOT_DIR; ?>bibliography/dl_print.php?action=clear" class="headerText2" style="color: #FF0000;"><?php echo __('Clear Print Queue'); ?></a>
00175     <hr />
00176     <form name="search" action="blank.html" target="blindSubmit" onsubmit="$('doSearch').click();" id="search" method="get" style="display: inline;"><?php echo __('Search'); ?> :
00177     <input type="text" name="keywords" size="30" />
00178     <input type="button" id="doSearch" onclick="setContent('mainContent', '<?php echo MODULES_WEB_ROOT_DIR; ?>bibliography/dl_print.php?' + $('search').serialize(), 'post')" value="<?php echo __('Search'); ?>" class="button" />
00179     </form>
00180     <div style="margin-top: 3px;">
00181         <?php
00182         echo __('Maximum').' <font style="color: #FF0000">'.$max_print.'</font> '.__('records can be printed at once. Currently there is').' '; //mfc
00183         if (isset($_SESSION['labels'])) {
00184             echo '<font id="queueCount" style="color: #FF0000">'.count($_SESSION['labels']).'</font>';
00185         } else { echo '<font id="queueCount" style="color: #FF0000">0</font>'; }
00186         echo ' '.__('in queue waiting to be printed.'); //mfc
00187         ?>
00188     </div>
00189 </div>

00193 /* BIBLIOGRAPHY LIST */
00194 require SIMBIO_BASE_DIR.'simbio_UTILS/simbio_tokenizecql.inc.php';
00195 require LIB_DIR.'biblio_list.inc.php';
00196 // table spec
00197 $table_spec = 'biblio LEFT JOIN item ON biblio.biblio_id=item.biblio_id';
00198 // create datagrid
00199 $datagrid = new simbio_datagrid();
00200 if ($can_read) {
00201     $datagrid->setSQLColumn('item.item_id', 'biblio.title AS `'.__('Title').'`',
00202         'IF(item.call_number!=\'\', item.call_number, biblio.call_number) AS `'.__('Call Number').'`');
00203 }
00204 $datagrid->setSQLorder('item.last_update DESC');
00205 // is there any search
00206 if (isset($_GET['keywords']) AND $_GET['keywords']) {
00207     $keywords = $dbs->escape_string(trim($_GET['keywords']));
00208     $searchable_fields = array('title', 'author', 'class', 'callnumber', 'itemcode');
00209     $search_str = '';
00210     // if no qualifier in fields
00211     if (!preg_match('@[a-z]+\s*=\s*@i', $keywords)) {
00212         foreach ($searchable_fields as $search_field) {
00213             $search_str .= $search_field.'='.$keywords.' OR ';
00214         }
00215     } else {
00216         $search_str = $keywords;
00217     }
00218     $biblio_list = new biblio_list($dbs);
00219     $criteria = $biblio_list->setSQLcriteria($search_str);
00220 }
00221 if (isset($criteria)) {
00222     $datagrid->setSQLcriteria('('.$criteria['sql_criteria'].')');
00223 }
00224 // set table and table header attributes
00225 $datagrid->table_attr = 'align="center" id="dataList" cellpadding="5" cellspacing="0"';
00226 $datagrid->table_header_attr = 'class="dataListHeader" style="font-weight: bold;"';
00227 // edit and checkbox property
00228 $datagrid->edit_property = false;
00229 $datagrid->chbox_property = array('itemID', __('Add'));
00230 $datagrid->chbox_action_button = __('Add To Print Queue');
00231 $datagrid->chbox_confirm_msg = __('Add to print queue?');
00232 // set delete proccess URL
00233 $datagrid->chbox_form_URL = $_SERVER['PHP_SELF'];
00234 $datagrid->column_width = array(0 => '75%', 1 => '20%');
00235 // put the result into variables
00236 $datagrid_result = $datagrid->createDataGrid($dbs, $table_spec, 20, $can_read);
00237 if (isset($_GET['keywords']) AND $_GET['keywords']) {
00238     $msg = str_replace('{result->num_rows}', $datagrid->num_rows, __('Found <strong>{result->num_rows}</strong> from your keywords')); //mfc
00239     echo '<div class="infoBox">'.$msg.' : "'.$_GET['keywords'].'"<div>'.__('Query took').' <b>'.$datagrid->query_time.'</b> '.__('second(s) to complete').'</div></div>'; //mfc
00240 }
00241 echo $datagrid_result;
00242 /* main content end */
00243 
00244 ?>
